Job Title: Adobe Architect

Location: Dallas, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Sales

Description:
Greetings Everyone,
I hope you are staying safe. We are hiring a Adobe Architect to join our Digital Engineering team.
Who are we?For the past 20 years, we have powered many Digital Experiences for the Fortune 500. Since 1999, we have grown from a few people to more than 4000 team members across the globe that are engaged in various Digital Modernization. For a brief 1 minute video about us, you can check https://youtu.be/uJWBWQZEA6o.
Job Title: Adobe ArchitectLocation: Dallas TX 
Responsibilities:The Adobe Analytics Architecture Lead is a pivotal role, dedicated to driving the implementation and optimization of Adobe Analytics and Adobe Target. This position demands extensive project leadership and a deep understanding of Adobe platforms, aimed at enhancing data collection capabilities and user experience on our e-commerce platform to significantly boost conversions and sales.
Key Responsibilities:Strategic Implementation and Oversight:Take charge of Adobe Analytics and Adobe Target Premium implementations across the organization.Develop and execute advanced data collection and analysis strategies that align with business objectives, emphasizing initial quality and accuracy to minimize iterative corrections.
Technical Leadership and Expertise:Act as the Subject Matter Expert (SME) for Adobe Analytics and Adobe Target, overseeing system updates and optimizing product recommendations.Design and maintain essential monitoring dashboards to evaluate the effectiveness and health of Adobe implementations.Innovate and manage calculated metrics and segments within Adobe Analytics and the Adobe Experience Platform to enhance data functionality.
Collaboration and Support:Collaborate with business and product owners to refine analytics implementations that meet business needs and elevate customer experiences.Provide continuous support and insights to internal teams on utilizing Adobe Analytics for marketing and enhancing customer experience.
Project Management:Document and articulate technical requirements and project progress effectively across teams and to senior executives.Manage project priorities in partnership with business leaders to ensure timely delivery of analytics capabilities.
Requirements:Professional Experience and Technical Skills:At least 7 years of hands-on experience in Adobe Analytics and Adobe Target implementation, including system administration and detailed analysis.Proficiency in Adobe Experience Cloud, Adobe Launch TMS, HTML, and JavaScript.Proven track record of developing and managing complex digital analytics frameworks.
Critical Thinking and Problem SolvingStrong analytical skills with a proactive approach to problem-solving; capable of leading efforts to dissect and rectify inaccuracies in data collection and analysis.Excellent problem-resolution skills, with a focus on leading team efforts to anticipate and tackle issues before they impact data integrity.
Communication and Leadership:Outstanding communication abilities, capable of explaining complex technical details and influencing decision-making through persuasive arguments.Demonstrated leadership in managing cross-functional projects and initiatives.
Industry Experience:Required experience working in an e-commerce business environment, with a deep understanding of digital retail operations and e-commerce analytics.
Educational Background:Bachelorâ€™s degree in computer science, Marketing, Business Administration, or related field required.
Desirable Attributes:Advanced proficiency in Excel and PowerPoint for sophisticated reporting and presentations

Experience Level (if available): Director
